Name: Watery Grave
Vanilla Text: Drown 3 enemies in water in a single battle with the Rift Walkers squad
AP Text: Drown 3 enemies in water in a single battle.

Name: Ramming Speed
Vanilla Text: Kill an enemy 5 or more tiles away with a Dash Punch with the Rift Walkers squad
AP Text: With a single action, move at least 4 tiles to kill an enemy that was at least 5 tiles from your starting position.

Name: Island Secure
Vanilla Text: Complete 1st Corporate Island with the Rift Walkers squad
AP Text: Complete at least one island with this squad.

Name: Overpowered
Vanilla Text: Overpower your Power Grid twice by earning or buying Power when it is full with the Rusting Hulks squad
AP Text: Increase your power grid's defense twice by adding power to a full grid. Does not count AP items received.

Name: Stormy Weather
Vanilla Text: Deal 12 damage with Electric Smoke in a single battle with the Rusting Hulks squad
AP Text: Deal 12 damage during the smoke damage phase of battle (explosion damage counts!)

Name: Perfect Battle
Vanilla Text: Take no Mech or Building Damage in a single battle with the Rusting Hulks squad (Repaired damage is still damage)
AP Text: Take no Mech or Building Damage in a single battle this squad (Repaired damage is still damage)

Name: Get Over Here
Vanilla Text: Kill an enemy by pulling it into yourself with the Zenith Guard squad
AP Text: Kill an enemy by pulling it into yourself

Name: Glittering C-Beam
Vanilla Text: Hit 4 enemies with a single laser with the Zenith Guard squad
AP Text: Hit at least 4 enemies with a single attack using a laser weapon.

Name: Shield Mastery
Vanilla Text: Block damage with a Shield 4 times in a single battle with the Zenith Guard squad
AP Text: Expend the shield guarding a mech or building 4 times in a single battle.

Name: Chain Attack
Vanilla Text: Have the Chain Whip attack chain through 10 tiles with the Blitzkrieg squad
AP Text: Affect at least 10 tiles with a single attack

Name: Lightning War
Vanilla Text: Finish the first 2 Corporate Islands in under 30 minutes with the Blitzkrieg squad
AP Text: Save two islands within 30 minutes of play time

Name: Hold the Line
Vanilla Text: Block 4 emerging Vek in a single turn with the Blitzkrieg squad
AP Text: Block 4 emerging mech in a single turn.

Name: Unbreakable
Vanilla Text: Have Mech Armor absorb 5 damage in a single battle with the Steel Judoka squad
AP Text: Use armor to block 5 damage in a single battle (including drain from Psion Tyrant)

Name: Unwitting Allies
Vanilla Text: Have 4 enemies die from enemy fire in a single battle with the Steel Judoka squad
AP Text: Cause 4 enemies to die during the enemy turn.

Name: Mass Displacement
Vanilla Text: Push 3 enemies with a single attack with the Steel Judoka squad
AP Text: Cause 3 enemies to move with a single action.

Name: Quantum Entanglement
Vanilla Text: Teleport a unit 4 tiles away with the Flame Behemoths squad
AP Text: Use a teleport attack on a unit 4 tiles away

Name: Scorched Earth
Vanilla Text: End a battle with 12 tiles on Fire with the Flame Behemoths squad
AP Text: Have 12 tiles on fire at once

Name: This is Fine
Vanilla Text: Have 5 enemies on Fire simultaneously with the Flame Behemoths squad
AP Text: Have 5 enemies on Fire simultaneously

Name: Cryo Expert
Vanilla Text: Shoot the Cryo-Launcher 4 times in a single battle with the Frozen Titans squad
AP Text: Shoot the Cryo-Launcher 4 times in a single battle.

Name: Pacifist
Vanilla Text: Kill less than 3 enemies in a single battle with the Frozen Titans squad
AP Text: Kill fewer than 3 enemies in a single battle.

Name: Trick Shot
Vanilla Text: Kill 3 enemies with a single attack of the Janus Cannon with the Frozen Titans squad
AP Text: Kill 3 enemies with a single attack.

Name: Healing
Vanilla Text: Heal 10 Mech Health in a single battle with the Hazardous Mechs squad
AP Text: Heal 10 health on friendly units within a single battle.

Name: Immortal
Vanilla Text: Finish 4 Corporate Islands without a Mech being destroyed at the end of a battle with the Hazardous Mechs squad
AP Text: Finish 4 islands without a single mech being destroyed

Name: Overkill
Vanilla Text: Deal 8 damage to a unit with a single attack with the Hazardous Mechs squad
AP Text: Deal 8 damage to a unit with a single action

Name: Hold the Door
Vanilla Text: Block 30 Emerging Vek enemies by the end of Island 2
AP Text: Block 30 Emerging Vek enemies by the end of Island 2

Name: No Survivors
Vanilla Text: Have 7 units (any team) die in a single turn
AP Text: Have 7 units (any team) die in a single turn

Name: Powered Blast
Vanilla Text: Pierce a Walking Bomb with the AP Cannon to kill an Enemy
AP Text: Kill an enemy by attacking through a unit you summoned this turn

Name: Spider Breeding
Vanilla Text: Spawn 15 Arachnoids in one Island
AP Text: Summon 15 allied units in one island

Name: Working Together
Vanilla Text: Area Shift 4 units at once
AP Text: Move 4 units with a single action

Name: Efficient Explosives
Vanilla Text: Kill 3 Enemies with 1 shot of the Ricochet Rocket
AP Text: Kill 3 enemies with a single attack.

Name: Stay With Me!
Vanilla Text: Heal 12 damage over the course of a single Island
AP Text: Heal 12 damage over the course of a single Island

Name: Let's Walk
Vanilla Text: Move Enemies with Control Shot 120 spaces in one game
AP Text: Move enemies 120 tiles over one run

Name: On the Backburner
Vanilla Text: Do 4 damage with the Reverse Thrusters
AP Text: Do 4 damage with a single attack

Name: Boosted
Vanilla Text: Boost 8 Mechs in one mission
AP Text: Boost 8 Mechs in one mission

Name: Feed the Flame
Vanilla Text: Light 3 Enemies on fire with a single attack
AP Text: Light 3 Enemies on fire with a single attack

Name: Maximum Firepower
Vanilla Text: Deal 8 damage with a single activation of the Quick-Fire Rockets
AP Text: Deal 8 damage with a single attack (any number of targets)

Name: Unstable Ground
Vanilla Text: Crack 10 tiles in one mission
AP Text: Crack 10 tiles in one mission

Name: Core of the Earth
Vanilla Text: Drop 10 Enemies into pits on one Island
AP Text: Drop 10 Enemies into pits on one Island

Name: Miner Inconvenience
Vanilla Text: Destroy 20 mountains in one game
AP Text: Destroy 20 mountains in one game

Name: Victory
Vanilla Text: Beat the game (any length)

Name: Hard Victory
Vanilla Text: Beat the game on Hard (any length)

Name: Adaptable Victory
Vanilla Text: Beat the game at least once per length (2, 3, & 4 Islands secured)

Name: Squads Victory
Vanilla Text: Beat the game with 4 different Squads (any length)

Name: Complete Victory
Vanilla Text: Beat the game with all 10 primary Squads (any length)

Name: Emerging Technologies
Vanilla Text: Unlock a new Mech Squad

Name: Friends in High Places
Vanilla Text: Spend 50 Reputation across all games

Name: Immovable Objects
Vanilla Text: Block 100 Vek across all games

Name: Humanity's Savior
Vanilla Text: Rescue 100,000 civilians across all games

Name: Perfect Strategy
Vanilla Text: Collect 10 Perfect Island rewards across all games

Name: Perfect Island
Vanilla Text: Do not fail any objective on a single Corporate Island

Name: The Defenders
Vanilla Text: Finish a Corporate Island without taking Building Damage

Name: Untouchable
Vanilla Text: Finish a Corporate Island without taking Mech Damage (Repaired damage is still damage)

Name: Backup Batteries
Vanilla Text: Earn or buy 10 Grid Power on a single Corporate Island

Name: Good Samaritan
Vanilla Text: Earn 9 Reputation from missions on a single Corporate Island

Name: Field Promotion
Vanilla Text: Have a Pilot reach maximum level

Name: Best of the Best
Vanilla Text: Have 3 Pilots at maximum level simultaneously

Name: Come Together
Vanilla Text: Unlock 6 additional Pilots

Name: I'm getting too old for this...
Vanilla Text: Have an individual Pilot fight the final battle 3 times across multiple games

Name: Distant Friends
Vanilla Text: Encounter a familiar face

Name: Sustainable Energy
Vanilla Text: Finish 3 Corporate Islands without dropping below 4 Grid Power

Name: Engineering Dropout
Vanilla Text: Finish 3 Corporate Islands without powering a Weapon Modification

Name: Chronophobia
Vanilla Text: Finish 3 Corporate Islands and destroy every Time Pod discovered

Name: There is No Try
Vanilla Text: Finish 3 Corporate Islands without failing an objective

Name: Trusted Equipment
Vanilla Text: Finish 3 Corporate Islands without equipping any new Pilots or weapons

Name: Change the Odds

Name: Loot Boxes!
Vanilla Text: Open 5 Time Pods in a single game with a Random squad

Name: Lucky Start
